questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

questions.question: How do I connect to the VPN?
questions.answer: To connect to the VPN, open the VPN client, enter your credentials, and click 'Connect'. Make sure you have the necessary permissions.

questions.question: What should I do if my computer is running slow?
questions.answer: If your computer is running slow, try restarting it. If the issue persists, check for updates or run a virus scan.
